title: Superdry t-shirt typeface
content:
Hello.

Need help for the typeface used in the t-shirt (not the initials). I presume is an altered version of a font, but i want to know what is the basic typeface they used.

Thank you

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131215164334im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tomboy2_4961.jpg)
author: insusi
